text.name: hl_infoDisplay_viewMpOff
text.text: *GLOBAL HUD/PDA/BOX* Displays ON/OFF/n/Deactivates all Displays (only Activ in Multiplayer)

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_viewNotAllIcons
text.text: ! Attention some Icons not displayed correctly !/n/Edit Width in %s (bottom right)

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_firstStart
text.text: -In all 4 corners of the HUD/PDA or Box you can execute standard Mouse actions/n/-Activate MouseControl (HL HUD SYSTEM: Default F9 Key)/n/-Within the HUD/PDA or Box you find more Mouse actions /n/-They can be different and will be set by the mod creator/n/-move your mouse cursor to the appropriate area

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_autoSaveTypOff
text.text: Automatic save is for this %s Disabled by Creator Mod

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_dragDropHudsWH
text.text: *HEIGHT* All HUDS/n/*WIDTH* only this HUD (MouseClick Left/Move/Left)/n/-The HEIGHT has a Max/Min. limit/n/-The WIDTH has a Min. limit

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_dragDropWH
text.text: *%s WIDTH/HEIGHT* (MouseClick Left/Move/Left)/n/-The WIDTH/HEIGHT has a Min. Limit

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_settingGlobal
text.text: *GLOBAL HUDS SETTINGS ON/OFF* (MouseClick Left/Move in HUD Area)

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_setting
text.text: *%s SETTINGS ON/OFF* (MouseClick Left)/n/-Settings depend on the Creator Mod

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_zoomOutIn
text.text: *ZOOM* Text/Icon in %s (MouseScroll Up/Down)/n/-If this %s Setting On

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_help
text.text: *%s HELP ON/OFF* (MouseClick Left)/n/-Help depend on the Creator Mod

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_extraLine
text.text: *%s MENU ON/OFF* (MouseClick Left)/n/-MENU depend on the Creator Mod

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_search
text.text: *SEARCHFILTER* Activate/Use/n/-FILTER depend on the Creator Mod

text.name: hl_infoDisplay_autoClose
text.text: *Display Automatic Open/Close* (MouseClick Left)/n/-Opens/Closes this Display is MouseCursor On/Off/n/-Display must be On

text.name: hl_guiBox_global_help_infoDisplay
text.text: *HUD/PDA/BOX STANDARD INFOS ON/OFF* all/n/Can show useful help infos if mouse cursor is in appropriate area./n/Has no effect to MOD infos.

text.name: hl_guiBox_global_help_autoSave
text.text: Saves automatically all data in preset saving interval./n/Only Mod creator released data of HUD/PDA/BOX will be saved./n/Manually save by clicking the disk icon.

text.name: hl_guiBox_global_help_saveInfo
text.text: Shows short info when all data are saved automatically./n/Has no effect when saving within PDA´s/Boxes

text.name: hl_guiBox_global_help_autoSaveTimer
text.text: Saving interval all ~%s sec (Standard %s)./n/Exit Game (regular) is always automatically save.

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_textTicker
text.text: Text Ticker can show Mod´s and Info´s in one area./n/! This HUD sytem has no effect to mod infos !

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_position
text.text: Determine %s Position/n/Alternative positions are only available if they have been preset.

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_drawBg
text.text: Shows background when a banner is displayed.

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_runTimer
text.text: *Standard value %s* (%s-%s)/n/Determine´s speed of displayed text./n/! PC\Server Performance can have effect to this value !

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_dropWidth
text.text: *Standard value %s*/n/Determine´s displayed text width./n/Also slightly affects running speed./n/Some languages/words can affect this value./n/Has no effect to letters or text length.

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_setInfo
text.text: Shows in the FS info bar a short information about an upcoming message./n/Displayed only if no previous messages have been activated.

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_setSound
text.text: Status: %s/n/Information sound will be played by incoming messages./n/Only played if no previos messages have been activated.

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_sayings
text.text: Shows you funny texts/sayings or... (Currently there are %s texts)/n/Tip: Text Ticker Position 2

text.name: hl_guiBox_textTicker_help_sayingsTimer
text.text: Show all %s min. funny texts/sayings or .../n/Tip: Text Ticker Position 2

text.name: hl_guiBox_modHidder_help
text.text: Mods running with *HL Hud System switch On/Off /n/! Mods must support this function!/n/ What is deactivated in a mod is set by the modder

text.name: hl_guiBox_otherMods_help
text.text: Gui Box Settings of different Mods created by *HL Hud System* /n/! Mods must support this function!
